resources.string:
Unfortunately we are not wizards!

So if you find a bug with any of these settings, please open up a ticket on Jira or contact a DU developer with the following.

1. Logcat or Last_Kmsg
2. Kernel and Mods used
3. Useful information

If you fail to report something, do not expect things to be fixed. Remember, we are not wizards so we do miss things.
Display the app icon corresponding with the toast
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
List of GAPPS packages to flash in recovery

Although GAPPS packages are not compiled from source and don\'t belong to nobody but Google, we would still like to take the time to thank a few individuals and team that maintain these packages for all of us and just make things easier for everyone.\n\nSpecial Thanks to Team BlackOut, Michael Banks, TKruzze and M. Wasif Chauhdary
Include options in the power menu for rebooting into recovery and bootloader
Press on color below to apply
Hide icons of unused SIM slots
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Reset network traffic color to default?
Don\'t show heads up in these applications
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
To allow applications to display interactive notifications in a pop-up window on your screen, enable Heads up.
Notification will show until it is dismissed
Change hosts file to disable ads
Updating hosts file failed. Please try again.
Double tap navigation bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap lockscreen to put the device to sleep
This will hide all Immersive Mode Messages
You have no button assigned any more to the \"Home\" action!\n\nThis can make your device unusable!
Use screen brightness level. Not for adaptive brightness!
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device\nOverrides playback control
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion!
Enable to show DU logo on the left side of statusbar
Scroll notification text in the statusbar.
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Configure location for weather widget and other settings
Enable to show weather options that go along with LockClock
Show basic weather in the extended statusbar area
Pick an icon for displaying the weather condition

recent recents disable search bar searchbar hide
Disable quick settings on secure lockscreen.
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.

Adjust the height of the trigger area
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area

Adjust the height of the trigger area
Open Quick Settings when there are %1$s notifications present
Power menu on the lock screen
Show clear all button on recents panel
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Two main tiles on the first row
This will hide all force close notifications
Tap an icon on the left or right to reassign a lock screen shortcut.
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk
Show carrier in status bar and lockscreen
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Make sure to turn OmniSwitch on if you\'re using OmniSwitch recents
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
It is not possible to delete required buttons
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Are you sure you want to disable this?
Available only for apps that support expanded notifications
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Enable/Disable action for the task manager button in the expanded statusbar area
Will give your sms notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your missed call notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar
Will give your voicemail notifications a breathing effect in the statusbar

Tap the edit icon to open the navigation ring for editing.

Select a target to configure its behavior.

Tap the check mark icon to save your changes, or restore to reset the settings to defaults.

To get started tap the edit icon to unlock the navigation bar for editing.

You can tap an icon to change its shortcut, or long press an icon to re-arrange the layout.

Tap save to commit your changes, or restore to reset the layout to default settings.
Delete current settings and restore the default layout?
Where do you want the menu buttons to appear?
How and when do you want the menu buttons to appear?
Navigation bar height while in portrait.
Navigation bar height while in landscape.
Navigation bar height if the bar is along a side.
Shows navigation bar in landscape on the bottom
Reset all dimensions entries to default?
Reset all style entries to default?
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing. Longpress to navigate up/down. Overrides IME switcher and menu buttons.
Change the navigation bar button color mode
Top pie does not show status and clock information
Change the button icon color mode
To avoid conflicts with status bar or navigation bar, the triggers on these edges are automatically turned off if one or both are available
Mirror right pie on the horizontal axis
Shows snap points to change the trigger edge dynamically
Shows phone status, time and date information
Minimum one of the main triggers (bottom, left or right) needs to be enabled.
Reduces left and right trigger size if keyboard is active
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set \'Enabled for all\' to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.

Lockscreen wallpaper set back to default
Long press lock icon to launch torch
This option will not work if both smart lock and accessibility touch exploration are enabled
Enable advanced settings for location in Quick Settings
Blurs and displays the content behind your lockscreen.
